#Functions
logit2prob <- function(logit){
  odds <- exp(logit)
  prob <- odds / (1 + odds)
  return(prob)
}

stargazer2 <- function(model, odd.ratio = F, ...) {
  if(!("list" %in% class(model))) model <- list(model)
    
  if (odd.ratio) {
    coefOR2 <- lapply(model, function(x) exp(coef(x)))
    seOR2 <- lapply(model, function(x) exp(coef(x)) * summary(x)$coef[, 2])
    p2 <- lapply(model, function(x) summary(x)$coefficients[, 4])
    stargazer(model, coef = coefOR2, se = seOR2, p = p2, ...)
    
  } else {
    stargazer(model, ...)
  }
}
launch_date <- as.POSIXct("2016-10-12 12:00:00",  format="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")

# Add newcomer comment features to newcomers_data

comment_summary <- comments %>% 
  group_by(user_id=comment_user_id) %>%
  summarise(comment_no=length(comment_id),
            questions = sum(questions),
            replies = sum(replies),

            words = sum(words)
  )

  group_by(user_id=as.factor(comment_user_id), week=floor_date(created_at, "week")) %>%
  summarise(comment_no=length(comment_id),
            questions = sum(questions),
            replies = sum(replies),

  )

remove(comment_summary)

# Import words
domain <- read.table("/Volumes/cbjackson2/language models/domain_clean.txt", quote="\"", comment.char="")
domain <- c(domain$x)

field <- read.table("/Volumes/cbjackson2/language models/science_clean.txt", quote="\"", comment.char="")
field <- c(field$x)

word_use <- read_csv("/Volumes/cbjackson2/language models/worddata/word_use_clean.csv") 
word_first_use <- data.frame(read_csv("/Volumes/cbjackson2/language models/worddata/word_first_use.csv"))

word_first_use$type <- ifelse(word_first_use$unigram %in% field,"Field",
                           ifelse(word_first_use$unigram %in% domain,"Domain","Regular"))

words_month <- word_first_use  %>%  
  group_by(week=floor_date(firstuse, "week")) %>% 
  summarize(
    count =length(unigram)) %>%
  mutate(
         agg_growth = cumsum(count),
         agg_pct = cumsum(count)/sum(count),
         diff_growth = agg_pct - lag(agg_pct))

# plot community language growth
lang_growth <- ggplot(words_month, aes(x=as.Date(week), y=agg_pct)) + 
  geom_line(size=1) + 
  geom_smooth(size=.7, color="grey") +
  labs(x="Month",y="Token growth") + 
  scale_x_date(date_labels="%b %y",date_breaks  ="4 month") + 
  theme_classic() + scale_color_nejm() +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = function(x) paste0(x*100, "%")) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1),
        legend.position="none", 
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 12, face="bold"),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 13, face="bold")) + 
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.Date("2016-10-12")),size=.25) + 
  geom_text(aes(x=as.Date("2016-10-11"), label="Project launch", y=.50), colour="grey", angle=90, vjust = -1, text=element_text(size=5))


words_month_type <- word_first_use %>% 
  group_by(week=floor_date(firstuse, "week"),type) %>% 
  summarize(
    count =length(unigram)) 

words_month_type <- data.frame(words_month_type)
words_month_type <- words_month_type[order(words_month_type$type,words_month_type$week),]

words_month_type <- words_month_type %>%
  group_by(type) %>% 
  mutate(
    agg_growth = cumsum(count),
    agg_pct = cumsum(count)/sum(count),
    diff_growth = agg_pct - lag(agg_pct)
)

type_growth <- ggplot(subset(words_month_type, type %in% c("Field","Domain")), aes(x=as.Date(week), y=agg_pct, group=type)) + 
  geom_line(size=1, aes(color=type)) + 
  geom_smooth(size=.7, aes(group=type), color="grey") +
  labs(x="Month",y="Token growth") + 
  scale_x_date(date_labels="%b %y",date_breaks  ="4 month") +

  geom_vline(aes(xintercept=as.Date("2016-10-01")), colour="black",size=.5) + 
  geom_text(aes(x=as.Date("2016-10-11"), label="Project launch", y=.7), colour="grey", angle=90, vjust = -1, text=element_text(size=5))

# get new threads created 
threads_commenting <- unigrams %>% 
  group_by(discussion_id) %>% 
  summarize(
    start=min(floor_date(comment_created_at, "week")),
    comments = length(unique(comment_id)),
    users = length(unique(comment_user_login)),
    starter = paste0(comment_user_login[which(min(comment_created_at))])
    )

threads_commenting_week <- threads_commenting  %>%  
  group_by(start) %>% 
  summarize(
    count=length(discussion_id)) %>%
  mutate(
         agg_growth = cumsum(count),
         agg_pct = cumsum(count)/sum(count),
         diff_growth = agg_pct - lag(agg_pct))

### Stats for community language growth
sens.slope(threads_commenting_week$agg_pct, conf.level = 0.95)
